alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 9:33PM CST until December 13 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHICOT COUNTY...NORTH CENTRAL EAST CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON... NORTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA AND NORTHWESTERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 932 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Gassoway, or 8 miles southeast of Eudora, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Glen Allan around 940 PM CST. Panther Burn around 950 PM CST. Hollandale around 955 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Kilbourne. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
